title: Husky puppy falls asleep on a step waiting for his owner to close his late-night restaurant
text:
This is the adorable moment a puppy fell asleep with its head leaning against a step.

Patiently waiting for his owner to take him home, the small husky dog couldn't stay awake any longer and gave himself 40 winks.

The sleeping dog was recorded in the city of Changsha, Hunan province in China.

In the footage, a passerby comes across the pup, who looks as if he might be stargazing.

But on closer inspection it is clear that the puppy's eyes have been firmly close for a while, and that he must have fallen asleep on the spot.

The filmer said the dog's owner ran the restaurant and it did not close until midnight.

Since the dog was tired, it fell asleep on the steps in front of the owner's eatery.

On average puppies need about six to ten hours of shut-eye every night, according to Purina PetCare.
description: This small husky puppy had been trying to stay up until his owner closed his Changsha, China restaurant at midnight, but ended falling asleep on some steps outside.
